events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your qualifications and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering roles since it fits the criteria for a software development position.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be in touch soon for next steps.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, focusing on your software engineering background and relevant skills.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed response to our screening follow-up questions regarding engineering experience.
Your technical interview focusing on software development and system design has been scheduled for next week.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with excellent demonstration of engineering problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your cultural fit and employment terms following your strong technical interview.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your communication skills and team compatibility.
We are pleased to propose an offer for the Software Engineer position that matches your skills and expectations discussed.
